Text: Well, you learn new shit every day, even here in the Pirate Bay. I didn't know that polishing jews was a cool thing to do with your wife. Makes me wonder about the appropriateness of a spit shine.

However, link to your radio/web shows.
Let us listen and then make comments on your family.
Oh, can't? well then - aren't you the miserable loudmouth.

Alidinpoo, did you really think you Jews would fool the patriots with a shill like Alex Jones? Too bad for you, only potheads and anarchists support that lard ass.
You'll have to find another Judas Goat, as his ass is sinking the SS Kosher ship fast~!

Run along now.

how petty and foolish this is for those of us who aren't racist and honestly don't give a shit if alex jones were even 100% jewish because helping or hurting the jewish state has nothing to do with his agenda, i know i listen to his show regularly, and really as long as he's there to stop the bankers in their tracks I and everyone else with any common sense has his back.  also, since we're observing this through the stereotype, wouldn't alex be trying to protect the jewish bankers system that secretly rules the world?  and let's break down what a zionist shill is, because to call alex jones a zionist shill is to say that his agenda is to defend the jewish state and eliminate the palestinian people entirely.  and when you listen to his show it really has nothing at all to do with any of that, if anything i see him coming down on the side of the oppressed which would be the palestinian people.  TalmudTimmy, i've been watching your antics for quite awhile now (as well as your lone fan joeblow) and really the best evidence you've ever had for your big problem with alex jones is that his wife is a polish jew.  c'mon, as long as you've been on his ass i'd think you'd have at least something better than that, but what's sad is that you really don't see that you'll never win anyone over to your side by calling anyones wife a jew, but i guess that's why everyone dismisses you as they do.  so my real question here is what you are - deluded or disinfo?

It's true than... If you can't debunk a persons rhetoric with fact... Slander his character, call him names or attack his family. 

You're shit stinks.
